title: Most Likely 1st Round Upsets, Celtics Injury
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Marc J. Spears and Kirk Goldsberry to talk the impact of the Celtics losing Rob Williams to injury, when Ja Morant may return, which team is most susceptible to a 1st Round upset this season and who will be the 7 & 8 seeds.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
